customer_name: Two By Two Animal Haven LLC
site_name: Two By Two Animal Haven LLC

citations.narrative:
There is an excessive amount of materials, unused caging, fencing and other miscellaneous items being stored in the
goat barn. Some of these items are stored on the shelf directly above the goat enclosure. This could negatively affect the
health of the animals if an item were to fall into the enclosure.
Buildings and grounds must be kept clean in order to protect the animals from injury and to minimize areas for vermin.
This area must be addressed and accumulations of miscellaneous storage items must be placed in designated areas and
cleared as necessary.
******Correct by December 15, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is an excessive amount of materials, unused caging, fencing and other miscellaneous items being stored in the 
goat barn. Some of these items are stored on the shelf directly above the goat enclosure. This could negatively affect the 
health of the animals if an item were to fall into the enclosure.  
 
Buildings and grounds must be kept clean in order to protect the animals from injury and to minimize areas for vermin. 
This area must be addressed and accumulations of miscellaneous storage items must be placed in designated areas and 
cleared as necessary. 
******Correct by December 15, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
